original_text: They wrote the names of Levi's descendants who were leaders of their clans in the history book of Israel. They did that until the time of Eliashib's son, Johanan. They wrote the names of Levi's descendants who were leaders of their clans in the history book of Israel. They did that until the time of Eliashib's son, Johanan.
korean_text: 레위 자손의 족장들은 엘리아십의 아들 요하난 때까지 역대지략에 기록되었으며

sentences.original_text: They wrote the names of Levi's descendants
who were leaders of their clans
in the history book of Israel
until the time of Eliashib's son, Johanan
